name: Ticketmaster
description:
Unleash your box office with TM1 Sales, a user-friendly, point-of-sale iPad app that lets you sell tickets anywhere inside or outside the venue. Instantly deliver mobile tickets to entice impulse purchases, shorten lines and power “pop-up” box offices for exciting promotions and easy sales.
Benefits:
• Increase revenue in more ways: Mobile point of sale creates limitless opportunities to sell tickets literally anywhere inside or outside of your venue—even offsite—before, during or after events.
• No training required: TM1 Sales' sleek, intuitive interface is easy to learn. Get new users up and running in 10 minutes or less.
• Shorten box office lines: Reduce wait times, quickly process credit card purchases and eliminate paper tickets. Fans get into the event faster and your team can focus on providing great customer service.
• Delight fans with major convenience: Use the interactive seat map to show buyers available seats and event layouts to let them choose what they want. Instant mobile delivery puts tickets in their hands right away
